unregistered_user_login: Unregistered users will be automatically registered upon login
one_story_visionyty: VisionY allows me to fully unleash my creativity.
generate_professional_storyboard_desc: Whether it's a meticulously crafted script or a fleeting spark of inspiration, our AI storyboard tool can instantly transform it into storyboards and scripts, preserving your inspiration forever.
produce_film_level_images_desc: With our proprietary AI dataset, you can quickly create your own visual stories without any art background. What you write is what you see, becoming an outstanding director with just one click.
control_image_elements_desc: Modify individual visuals using text prompts and 2D/3D image editors, enabling flexible and precise control and editing of specific visual elements.
build_character_assets: Build your exclusive character asset library
build_character_assets_desc: Create your own actor library using prompts and character images, allowing everyone to build their own IP characters and embark on a vast heroic universe.
start_creative_journey: Start your creative journey now and witness the power of creativity together.
believe_in_dreams: At VisionY, we believe every dream should be cherished, and every idea deserves to be realized.
suitable_for_various_scenarios: Suitable for various scenarios and cases
testimonial_1: This product has saved me from many tedious steps in pre-production, allowing easy adjustments to camera angles and movements. It greatly improves the efficiency of ideation and communication, letting me focus on storytelling and emotional expression.
testimonial_2: VisionY helps me preview the effects of various lighting setups before shooting, which is crucial for controlling the visual style of the film. It not only speeds up my workflow but also provides more room for artistic creation.
testimonial_3: The AI storyboard tool offers a new dimension for art design, breaking free from the limitations of traditional tools and opening up endless creative possibilities. I can easily adjust and experiment with different styles to achieve the best visual effects.
testimonial_4: Even without a professional filmmaking background, this storyboard tool allows me to easily turn my story ideas into visualized content. Its interface is intuitive and truly user-friendly.
user_comment_1: Witnessed the growth of One Story, hoping it gets better and better.

user_comment_3: Very user-friendly, perfect for novel promotions.
